operations.content:
- name: stabilize_route_a_href_views_statistics_php
    steps:
      - action: replace
        path: .bgl_core/brain/scenarios/generated/gap_route_views_statistics_php.yaml
        match: 'a[href="../views/statistics.php"]'
        replacement: 'a[href="/views/statistics.php"]'
        mode: overwrite
